channel.title: We got a problem..(Any1 please? I found something interesting)

item.title: We got a problem..(Any1 please? I found something interesting)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Took out the beard code, still not helping… :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 20, 2008, 01:33:27 PM[/size][hr]Very interesting! The old characters in my file that saved Before i changed the starting outfit dont change to the starting outfit! only the new chars

EDIT: its gotta be something with the saving of a new character or soemthing like that
EDIT: Found this in my player.java… very interesting //also making the playerName equal the player id it stops it from saving unless a savedgame was loaded...

Read full topic

item.title: We got a problem..(Any1 please? I found something interesting)
item.dc:creator: @1c3 1c3
item.description:
@1c3 wrote:

well it shouldnt do that unless you have added something wrong.

try logging in on the same account and tae the stuff off and then log out and back in.

it it appears that you are still wearing the stuff then you must not have a player saving thing right.

item.title: We got a problem..(Any1 please? I found something interesting)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

I changed starting look on players, no compile errors, heres all that i changed in the player.java [code] //Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 0;
playerLook[1] = 7;
playerLook[2] = 8;
playerLook[3] = 9;
playerLook[4] =5;
playerLook[5] = 0;

	/*playerLook[0] = 1;
	playerLook[1] = 5;
	playerLook[2] = 5;
	playerLook[3] = 6;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 10;*/

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=6109;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=6111;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=6107;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=6108;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=6110;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6106;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1323;

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=50;
	pTorso=56;
	pArms=61;
	pHands=67;
	pLegs=70;
	pFeet=79;
	pBeard=-1;
            pBeard=-1; [/code] I dun mess with anything else, now, lets say i change my person from the starting look, i save then logg out, when i logg back in my person looks the same as the starting look again! How do i fix this??

EDIT: I will post pics if i have 2…

Read full topic
